remarks: Lemma for ~ sylow2a .  An equivalence class of fixed points is a singleton.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
sylow2a.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
sylow2a.m $e |- ( ph -> .(+) e. ( G GrpAct Y ) ) $.

sylow2a.f $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
sylow2a.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. Fin ) $.
sylow2a.z $e |- Z = { u e. Y | A. h e. X ( h .(+) u ) = u } $.
sylow2a.r $e |- .~ = { <. x , y >. | ( { x , y } C_ Y /\ E. g e. X ( g .(+) x ) = y ) } $.
sylow2alem1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. Z ) -> [ A ] .~ = { A } ) $.
